alert.note: Alert for Dunklin (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 9:51PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Mississippi and southeastern Dunklin Counties through 1015 PM CDT... At 951 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Senath, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Blytheville, Gosnell, Manila, Senath, Hornersville, Calumet, Poplar Corner, Stark City, Buckeye, Woodland Corner, Rives, Hornersville Junction, Cotton Plant, Bucoda, Vincit, Gilbert, Hollywood, Caruth, Sunrise and Europa. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
